wikipedia_page.main: HhMitchum David "Mitch" Ward (born 19 June 1971) is an English former professional footballer who played in the Football League and Premier League for Sheffield United, Crewe Alexandra, Everton, Barnsley and York City.

link_mentions.page: 1997 Football League First Division play-off Final
response: Sheffield United received their first booking of the game in the 70th minute when Fjørtoft was given a yellow card for an altercation with Tuttle.CRY V SHU Play Off Final 1997, 01:35:16  Two minutes later, he was brought down by Dean Gordon on the edge of the Crystal Palace penalty area,CRY V SHU Play Off Final 1997, 01:36:48 but the resulting free kick from Mitch Ward to the far post came to nothing.CRY V SHU Play Off Final 1997, 01:37:47  With 15 minutes of regular time remaining, Nilsen beat Muscat on the left wing to send in a high cross for Taylor but it was cleared by the Crystal Palace defenders.CRY V SHU Play Off Final 1997, 01:40:02  Shortly after, Nash punched clear a corner which was kicked back to him, forcing him to catch the ball before Fjørtoft was able to head it.CRY V SHU Play Off Final 1997, 01:42:12  A minute later, Dyer's cross was cleared behind by Sandford for a corner, which Shipperley headed wide.CRY V SHU Play Off Final 1997, 01:42:59
